title: APUKUNA - Breath Medicine 001
description: The Apukuna Breath Medicine series of mixes is a gift in support of personal healing, transformation and growth. As one of my teachers reminds - we come to earth with a carefully constructed "care pac
cleaned_text: Apukuna published on 2021-07-07T00:00:39Z The Apukuna Breath Medicine series of mixes is a gift in support of personal healing, transformation and growth. As one of my teachers reminds - we come to earth with a carefully constructed "care package" known as our breath. [Full series playlist: https://soundcloud.com/apukuna/sets/apukuna-breath-medicine] Our breath is the most readily accessible medicine available to us. There are many ways to work with our breath and this series is in support of your practice. These particular breath medicine journeys are inspired by my own practice that is most similar to Holotropic Breathwork. For me, the breathing is deeper, a little faster, only through the mouth and only through the chest. Many others can find great benefit through the nose or using the belly. Best advice... experiment and listen to your body. With love from the mountains. [mix001] - This 47-minute journey was recorded in August 2020 and has been my most trusted breathwork companion ever since. Tracklist: 1. Darpan - [Chakapa sample] 2. OM @ @meditative-mind 3. Maneesh de Moor - 136.1Hz Sun Salutation 4. Maneesh de Moor - 111Hz Breath of Life 5. Tone Ranger - Flow @tonerangermusic 6. Deya Dova - The Winged One @deya-dova Arcana of Orion 8. Loituma - Viimesen Kerran (The Very Erothyme - LMNL (Water) @erothyme 10. Deya Dova - Transmission the Tribe 11.
